data.value:
规则来源： https://github.com/Chuyu-Team/Dism-Multi-language/issues/856 https://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/45018-turn-off-clear-acrylic-taskbar-transparency-windows-10-a-2.html https://windowsreport.com/transparent-taskbar-windows-11/
1803 以上系统支持 19043.1165 亲测有效 LTSC、家庭版可能效果不完美 请点击最下方“展开阅读全文” 若开启过半透明效果，启用其他效果时，需另外结束 dwm.exe 进程！ 重启资源管理器进程是指：结束进程后重新运行，并非右键中的重启 Win11 132 亲测无效
系统默认： ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00
[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced] "TaskbarAcrylicOpacity"=-
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced] "UseOLEDTaskbarTransparency"=-
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\Dwm] "ForceEffectMode"=- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
高斯模糊： 支持深、浅色模式 支持任务栏主题色 需重启资源管理器进程 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00
[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Themes\Personalize] ; 开启透明效果 "EnableTransparency"=dword:00000001
[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced] ; 任务栏透明度 "TaskbarAcrylicOpacity"=dword:00000005
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced] "UseOLEDTaskbarTransparency"=dword:00000000
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\Dwm] "ForceEffectMode"=- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
半透明： 注：开始菜单、日历、操作中心背景模糊透明效果将消失！ 支持深、浅色模式 支持任务栏主题色 需重启 dwm.exe 进程 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00
; Created by: Shawn Brink ; Created on: March 23rd 2016 ; Updated on: December 5th 2019 ; Tutorial: https://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/45018-turn-off-clear-acrylic-taskbar-transparency-windows-10-a.html
[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Themes\Personalize] ; 开启透明效果 "EnableTransparency"=dword:00000001
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced] "UseOLEDTaskbarTransparency"=dword:00000001
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\Dwm] "ForceEffectMode"=dword:00000001 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
全透明： 仅支持深色模式 不支持任务栏主题色 若无效果，请开关一次“透明效果” 需重启资源管理器进程 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00
[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Themes\Personalize] ; 开启透明效果 "EnableTransparency"=dword:00000001 ; 关闭任务栏主题色 "ColorPrevalence"=dword:00000000 ; 浅色模式开关 "SystemUsesLightTheme"=dword:00000000
[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced] ; 任务栏透明度 "TaskbarAcrylicOpacity"=dword:00000000
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced] "UseOLEDTaskbarTransparency"=dword:00000000
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\Dwm] "ForceEffectMode"=- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
